---
title: "Sweep A - general experiment analysis."
output: html_notebook
---

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gridExtra)
library(readr)
library(scales)

normalize <- function(x) {
    return ((x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x)))
}
```


# Load and process

```{r, message=FALSE}
name <- "../data/exp73_d-2e-3_f20.csv"
# name <- "../data/sweep_test12.csv"
results <- read_csv(paste(name, sep=""))

rm(name)

# Add delta_spikes
results %>% 
  mutate(delta_spikes = n_spikes - n_spikes_ref) %>% 
  mutate(V_osc = V_osc - V_osc_ref) -> results
```


# Overall distributions

```{r, fig.width=2.5, fig.height=1.5}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=variances)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) + 
  xlab("Variance") +
  theme_classic() -> p1

results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=errors)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) + 
  xlab("Error") +
  theme_classic() -> p2

results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc/V_b)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
  xlab("Vc/Vb (volt)") +
  theme_classic() -> p3

results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_comp_ref/V_b)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
  xlab("Vo/Vb (volt)") +
  theme_classic() -> p4

grid.arrange(p1, p2, p3, p4, nrow=2)
rm(p1, p2, p3, p4)
```

# Pop level
## As

```{r, fig.width=1.25, fig.height=1.15}
results %>% 
  filter(rank == 0) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=As*1e9, y=variances_pop)) +
  geom_point(size=0.1) + 
  theme_classic() +
  theme(legend.position="bottom") 
```

```{r, fig.width=1.25, fig.height=1.15}
results %>% 
  filter(rank == 0) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=As*1e9, y=errors_pop)) +
  geom_point(size=0.1) + 
  theme_classic() 
```

```{r, fig.width=1.25, fig.height=1.15}
results %>% 
  filter(rank == 0) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=As*1e9, y=n_spikes_pop)) +
  geom_point(size=0.1) + 
  theme_classic() 
```


## Metrics

```{r, fig.width=1.25, fig.height=1.15}
results %>% 
  filter(rank == 0) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=variances_pop, y=errors_pop)) +
  geom_point(size=0.1) + 
  theme_classic() 
```

# N level

## del. spikes

```{r, fig.width=1.25, fig.height=1.15}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=1e9*As, y=delta_spikes)) +
  geom_point(size=0.1) + 
  theme_classic() 
```

## Error

```{r, fig.width=1.25, fig.height=1.15}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=1e9*As, y=errors)) +
  geom_point(size=0.1, alpha=0.01) + 
  theme_classic() 
```

```{r, fig.width=4.0, fig.height=4}
results %>% 
  filter(rank < 20) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=1e9*As, y=errors, color=factor(delta_spikes))) +
  geom_point(size=1, alpha=1) +
  facet_wrap(~rank) +
  theme_classic() + theme(legend.position="bottom") +
  scale_colour_brewer(palette = "Accent") +
  xlab("As") 
```

## Var

```{r, fig.width=1.25, fig.height=1.15}
results %>% 
  # filter(rank == 0) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=1e9*As, y=variances)) +
  geom_point(size=0.1, alpha=0.01) + 
  theme_classic() 
```

```{r, fig.width=4.0, fig.height=4}
results %>% 
  filter(rank < 30, n_spikes < 9) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=1e9*As, y=variances, color=factor(delta_spikes))) +
  geom_point(size=1, alpha=0.9) +
  facet_wrap(~rank) +
  theme_classic() + theme(legend.position="bottom") +
  scale_colour_brewer(palette = "Accent") +
  xlab("As (namp)") 
```

```{r, fig.width=1.25, fig.height=1.15}
results %>%

  geom_point(size=0.1, alpha=0.01) + 
  ylab("V_osc (mvolt)") +
  theme_classic() 
```


```{r, fig.width=1.25, fig.height=1.15}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc*1e3, y=errors)) +
  geom_point(size=0.1, alpha=0.01) + 
  xlab("V_osc (mvolt)") +
  theme_classic() 
```

```{r, fig.width=1.25, fig.height=1.15}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc*1e3, y=variances)) +
  geom_point(size=0.1, alpha=0.01) + 
  xlab("V_osc (mvolt)") +
  theme_classic() 
```

```{r, fig.width=1.25, fig.height=1.15}
results %>%
```

## Metrics

```{r, fig.width=1.25, fig.height=1.15}
results %>% 
  filter(variances > 0.005) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=variances*1e3, y=errors*1e3)) +
  geom_point(size=0.1, alpha=0.01) + 
  xlab("variances (ms)") + ylab("error (ms)") +
  theme_classic() 
```

```{r, fig.width=4.0, fig.height=4}
results %>% 
  filter(rank < 20) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=variances*1e3, y=errors*1e3, color=factor(n_spikes - n_spikes_ref))) +
  geom_point(size=1, alpha=.8) + 
  facet_wrap(~rank) +
  xlab("variances (ms)") + ylab("error (ms)") +
  theme_classic() + theme(legend.position="bottom") +
  scale_colour_brewer(palette = "Accent") 
```


```{r, fig.width=1.3, fig.height=3.0}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=variances*1e3, y=errors*1e3, color=1e9*As)) +
  geom_point(size=0.05, alpha=0.1) + 
  facet_grid(delta_spikes ~ .) +
  xlab("variances (ms)") + ylab("error (ms)") +
  scale_color_gradient2(low="white", high="black") +
  theme_classic() + theme(legend.position="bottom") 
```

## Vo by Vc

```{r, fig.width=1.25, fig.height=1.15}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc*1e3, y=V_comp*1e3)) +
  geom_point(size=0.1, alpha=0.9) + 
  xlab("V_osc (mvolt)") + ylab("V_comp (mvolt)") +
  theme_classic() 
```

```{r, fig.width=3.5, fig.height=1.15}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc*1e3, y=V_comp*1e3, color=As*1e9)) +
  geom_point(size=0.1, alpha=0.05) +
  facet_grid(.~delta_spikes) +
  xlab("V_osc (mvolt)") + ylab("V_comp (mvolt)") +
  scale_color_gradient(name="A (namp)", low="white", high = "red") +
  theme(legend.position="bottom") +
  theme_classic() 
```
